name: MidEast Aviation Academy "MAA"
about: MidEast Aviation Academy (MAA), established in 2000 at Amman-Marka Airport, is the first privately owned flight training academy in Jordan. Founded by a senior executive team from the Jordan Air Force, MAA is renowned for its high-level education and training modules delivered by highly qualified instructors. The academy offers a range of programs including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), Type Rating Training, and more. Approved by the Jordan Civil Aviation Regulatory Commission (JCARC) and the International Air Transport Association (IATA), MAA boasts a modern fleet of aircraft and advanced simulators. With a focus on practical training and career readiness, MAA provides students with exceptional educational and entrepreneurial opportunities, preparing them for successful careers in international aviation. MAA is committed to graduating qualified pilots and aviation professionals, ready to serve in various global aviation fields.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
